MSUBJ.content: Artaud’s neologism innée, where nature collides w/ its contrary, “suffering of the pre-natal,” appears as monstrosity [Lacan’s extimacy?]

VP.content: Hinzeigen (“monstration"), Anzeigen (referral); for Husserl, to keep self-presence from being absolutely nothing, there must be a Hinzeigen w/out Anzeigen

POOF.content: [overflowing, rushed parentheses] Dupin [‘Purloined…’] calls himself a partisan, designates self-destruction of someone who resembles him like a brother: pitiless sympathy of war to death (among brothers) > monstrous truths, truth as monstrous
the question “what is a crime against humanity?” is pregnant w/ a future whose monstrosity ne porte pas de nom

SH.content: figure of absolute future: monstrosity—Elijah, guest, other [re: word to be circumcised opened like a door to “who” would come]

P.content: an object is “prodigious,” monstrous (not colossal), when, by size, it annihilates & reduces to nothing the end which constitutes its concept, exceeds the final limit, overflows end & concept

colossal is almost too (presque trop) large for presentation: singular originality w/out edging (bordure) or simple overspill (débordement) > how can we think of this “almost too,” this incised in excess

OTO.content: institutions of “yes,” have need of ears: Nietzsche doesn’t expect the ears and hands for his truths today—my small ears no small interest to ladies, makes me a monster, anti-ass, Anti-Christ

ATIA.content: Bellerophon, figure of hunter, hunting/taming the Chimaera: Ecce animot, a chimera, neither species nor gender, living multiplicity of mortals, monstrous hybrid

FS.content: medieval theology (Considérans): all forms, even monsters, beautiful, Formosus means beautiful > form is transcendentally beautifully: it is [Being] and makes things be [creating]

Gii.content: speak of Heidegger, speak of monstrosity
le monstre > la monstre (montre) > what shows in order to warn or put on guard, a watch, prescribes the divisions of a line of verse [m/f]
Hölderlin: we are a sign/monster (Zeichen) w/out sense (deutungslos): on verge of being lost in translation > Heidegger’s bond btwn Zeichen, zeigen, Aufzeigung, btwn sign & monstration
hand is monstrosité (monstrasity), proper characteristic of man as the being of monstration
“can’t talk about hand w/out talking about technology” [Derrida has just recalled photographs of Heidegger’s hands, way the hands seem deliberately staged, overflow the frame]

writing is hand-writing in its essence, makes word manifest, monstre; co-belonging of hand & speech: ability to produce monstres that disclose concealment [still a phono-logocentrism, but one where handwriting is immediately bound to speech]
monster man has a single hand

RM.content: for Heidegger, Metasprache and Sputnik are the same, monstrous project of father, of metaphysics (mastery of form for form’s sake)

TR.content: machine/event resembles a monster: there is no resemblance to a monster, so new figure of event-machine is no longer a figure
“us”: those of us who find ourselves inhabiting this uninhabitable machine-event monster, who refuse to subordinate one to the other

+R.content: Adami shows what is forbidden to Glas, out of range of its signatory, signs the absolute reverse of a text: monstration, exhibition, exposes the exposition ——can never gather the event together in a spectacle [can draw a double band]

ATM.content: the Relation to the Other is not a phenomenal monstration, and is not readable w/in the uncertainty of rigorous limits of a lexicon, language, semiotics, logic, etc.

BSi.content: [how can politics rise above the natural while also being a monstrous, bestial fable?]

OG.content: rigorous investigation beyond closure of knowledge, take positivity of science to its limits—monstrous, breaks absolutely w/ normality > faithful to l’avenir (for which there is yet no exergue [chapter title: exergue])
writing as “trap,” pathology (blind), idolatry; for Saussure, Leibniz’s fixed language would be like a hen hatching a duck’s egg > “la perversion de l’artifice engendre des monstres”
writing: absence of signatory/referent, a “fixité” different from speech’s, a monstrosity, écart naturel dans la nature > must contain it like a leper

SPEC.content: repetition, reproductivity, works w/out saying anything, like death drive, not even “form,” w/out thesis, de-monstration makes its proof (preuve) sans montrer > de-monstration folds into everything it makes explicit, pas de démonstration remains (reste) in this restance
